Title: Episode 6
Plot: Tensions rise in the house as Dad accepts Cardwell's offer to design an eco-friendly development. Meredith has her most frightening vision yet ? while in real life she paddles out to Kaitangata in her sleep. And she is being followed...
GuestStars: Tihi Puanaki as Nana, Rangimoana Taylor as Grandpa, Robert Gilbert as Eric Ponty, Angus Benfield as Tom, Sheryl Morris as Mrs Reynolds, Hannah Gould as Librarian, Elizabeth O'Connor as Marg, Charles K
